Describe why it's a good choice for high-fidelity production apps.`, [], `Analyzing Library Resource: ${resource.name}`, ['ForgeAI Specialist'] ); setAiInsight(insight); } catch (e) { setAiInsight("ForgeAI analysis failed to initialize. Please check your connectivity."); } finally { setIsAnalyzing(false); } }; return (
